A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely horrible. Maybe among the worst movies I have ever seen. Makes the prequels actually seem good. It's like whoever made the movie never watched the previous movies all the way through\, just went off getting the general idea. Not even in comparison to the other Star Wars movies. It's just bad. Hollywood has ruined my childhood. Transformers\, GI Joe\, you name it. Ruined.
